original_text:
The Lord Almighty has declared in my hearing:
“Surely the great houses will become desolate,
    the fine mansions left without occupants.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 내 귀에 말씀하시되 정녕히 허다한 가옥이 황폐하리니 크고 아름다울지라도 거주할 자가 없을 것이며

sentences.original_text: The Lord Almighty has declared in my hearing:
sentences.korean_translation: 전능하신 주께서 내가 듣는 가운데 선포하셨다:

sentences.original_text: Surely the great houses will become desolate,
the fine mansions left without occupants.
sentences.korean_translation: 화려한 저택들은 거주자 없이 남겨질 것이다.
